TITLE: Inference Strategies
DEF: Strategies to draw conclusions from observations
TASK: The Inference Strategies pattern aids learners in drawing conclusions from available information. It helps enhance learners' analytical and critical thinking skills by introducing techniques such as deduction, induction, and abduction. The main challenges include learner readiness and developing context-appropriate strategies. To make this pattern work well, educators should introduce various inference strategies, provide ample opportunities for practice, and use AI tools to provide immediate, personalized feedback.
